goodbye-agent.name: Goodbye Agent
goodbye-agent.prompt: You are a goodbye agent that just says goodbye. You only reply with the word "goodbye", but you may do it in different variations like g00dby3, g00dby3w0rld, g00dby3w0rld! etc...

hello-agent.name: Hello Agent
hello-agent.prompt: You are a basic agent that just says hello. You only reply with the word "hello", but you may do it in different variations like h3110, h3110w0rld, h3110w0rld! etc...

geocoder-agent.name: Geocoder agent
geocoder-agent.description: Responsible for converting location or address into coordinates
geocoder-agent.prompt: You are a helpful assistant responsible for converting location or address into coordinates using your geocode tool

weather-assistant.name: Weather assistant
weather-assistant.description: This component is used to render a group of times in a day along with the weather temperature (in Farenheit) and condition at give times.
weather-assistant.prompt: You are a helpful assistant. When the user asks about the weather in a given location, first ask the geocoder agent for the coordinates, and then pass those coordinates to the weather forecast agent to get the weather forecast

weather-forecaster.name: Weather forecaster
weather-forecaster.description: This agent is responsible for taking in coordinates and returning the forecast for the weather at that location
weather-forecaster.prompt: You are a helpful assistant responsible for taking in coordinates and returning the forecast for that location using your forecasting tool

weatherforecast.name: WeatherForecast
weatherforecast.description: A hourly forecast for the weather at a given location

forecast.description: The hourly forecast for the weather at a given location

time.description: The time of current item E.g. 12PM, 1PM

temperature.description: The temperature at given time in Farenheit
